name: XBall Champion
description:
PROMOTION!!!
Now you can get this game for only $0.11 or less on http://h2obundle.com


XBall Champion is a casual sport game with unique game play.

Features
1. Very simple game play rules
2. Singleplayer & multiplayer modes
3. Steam achievement

Controls
1. Classical FPS control scheme (WSAD move & Mouse look)
2. Left mouse button for dash (only available when dash icon shown)

Rules
1. Hit the exited (highlighted) ball to get into exited state
2. Score a goal in exited state
3. Team with higher score win the game
